original_title: India v Australia at Mohali, 3rd Test, Mar 14-18, 2013
overview: Michael Clarke has won the toss and Australia will bat first. The break has helped the, says Clarke. They need to score heavily, he says. Haddin replaces Wade, Smith in for Watson, Maxwell makes way for Lyon, and Starc takes Pattinson's place. Australia won by 4 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)
tagline: Australia tour of India, 3rd ODI: India v Australia at Mohali, Oct 19, 2013
title: India v Australia at Mohali, 3rd Test, Mar 14-18, 2013
